paper_abstract: The notion of an n-ary group is a natural generalization of the notion of a group and has many applications in different branches. In this paper, the notion of (normal) fuzzy n-ary subgroup of an n-ary group is introduced and some related properties arc investigated. Characterizations of fuzz), n-ary subgroups are given.
paper_title: Fuzzy n-Ary Groups as a Generalization of Rosenfeld's Fuzzy Groups
